Package org.texgen.textures.signal

Contains textures which depend on signals for their output

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AlphaSignal AlphaSignal multiplies the alpha channel value of the incoming source texture by a value defined by the alpha signal input.
GradientSignalTexture Takes a gradient and a signal, and uses the signal to determine where we interpolate the gradient.
SmoothThreshold Returns either sourceA or sourceB depending on the alpha value in the signal source.
Threshold Switches the output based on the input from the source signal in comparison to the threshold level.
UVSignalTexture Takes one or two signal sources and uses them to generate new U,V values based on the U,V signals.
 

Package org.texgen.textures.signal Description

Contains textures which depend on signals for their output
